_sText:
After 7 months finaly a new version of the map.

This map is based on the game musical chairs. instead, i made it work with rooms. Everyone starts with a knife in a pretty small area. while you are knifing you will hear some music and when it stops some doors will open. only 1 player is able to get in a room (and with luck 2 people can - but if they do that in the last round both will still die).

Unlike with the previous versions there is now only a version with knifes.

Each round is seperated in 5 shorter rounds. The doors that open in each round are random
round 1 opens 20 doors
round 2 opens 14 doors
round 3 opens 8 doors
round 4 opens 4 doors
round 5 opens 1 door
On average this should take: 2 minutes

Changes since b2:
- Sub rounds are now made shorter (10-20 seconds)
- More weird music and boring ones removed
- People now get autohealed back to 100hp so only a backstab will kill now
- Changed the look of the map
- Added details like the background
- Doors are now transparent so you can see the people die in front of you (coused a problem in seeing which doors are open - will be changed in the next version!)
